Performer:
Nozawa Katsuhei II (see also Nozawa Kizaemon III) (野澤勝平 (二))

Alternate Name: Nozawa Kizaemon III (野澤喜左衛門 (三))

Dates: '1950-1987/04'

Specialty: Shamisen

Notes: Bunraku meikan (1980, 1985, 1988, 1990, 1994)


– Click image to view.
